pageProduct.name: Pearl Drops Everyday Extreme White Cool Mint Toothpaste 110g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pearl Drops Extreme White Everyday Whitening Toothpaste helps whiten teeth by removing from smoking, coffee, tea and other discolouration.

Pearl Drops Extreme White Everyday Whitening Toothpaste helps whiten teeth without the use of harsh abrasives, bleaches or acidic pH. The specially developed formulation fights stains from smoking, coffee, tea and other discolouration. The anti-cavity fluoride formulation helps remove plaque, strengthen tooth enamel and protect against tooth decay and fight tartar.

Boxed Contents: Pearl Drops Toothpaste 110g

Size: 110g

Fragrance Free?: n/a

Hypo Allergenic?: n/a

Skin Type: n/a

KEY FEATURES

• Specialist whitening formula developed specifically for smokers .
• Helps remove nicotine stains that can leave teeth looking yellow and dull.
• Also helps removes stains caused by tea, coffee and red wine, and other discolouration.
• Coolmint flavour provides longer lasting fresh breath
• Proudly made in Australia

Warnings

Do not use in children 6 years of age or less.

Ingredients

Water, Hydrated Silica, Calcium Pyrophosphate, Sorbitol, Glycerin, Dicalcium Phosphate, Peg-12, Sodium Lauryl Sulphate, Flavour, Titanium Dioxide, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Saccharin, Trisodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate.

Active Ingredients: Sodium Monofluorophosphate 0.76% w/w

Contains: Sodium Monoflurophosphate 0.76% w/w

Directions

Brush 2 times daily. Continue to use twice daily to protect whiteness.
USE IN PLACE OF YOUR REGULAR TOOTHPASTE

USAGE ADVICE

Do not use in children 6 years of age or less.
